name: Jelly's Adventure
description:
The Jelly want to see the Good Tree.

But there are a lot of Traps!!

Please help The Jelly for he gonna see The Good Tree.

It's just only 2 Stage so you can do this!!

But it will be pretty hard cuz a lot of traps waiting The Jelly

Falling platform, Spine, Saw, Cliff, and even Coin!!

You can do this! Please help the Jelly!

You can Move by Move : →←↑↓
Jump : Space bar You can long Jump or short Jump
when you die, Respawn button : Space bar
Reset the save point : R

When you cleared all stage, recommend to your friend or boss
